channel.title: Emps-Scape Reborn Coming soon
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/2w52153.png[/img]
[b]What I've Done[/b]
[i][b]*Working Specials 100% Done *Working Teleports 100% Done *Working Ancients 100% Done *Fixed Lunars 100% Done *Regulars Magic has been fixed. 100% Done *Fixed prayers 100% Done *All hits are based on Your Gear 100% Done *Ghost in wildy Teleports you to Daganoth kings 100% Done *Started Pack has been Fixed 100% Done *Ring of Stone has been Fixed 100% Done *Attack Style has been Fixed 98% Done , Dh axe doesnt work yet *Same Shops has been added 100% Done[/b][/i]
[i][b]Working on At the moment.[/b][/i]
[i][b]*Starting Tutorial 28% Done *Same Npc Locations 80% Done *Same Locations to Switch to Ancients/Lunars 10% Done *Quest Tab Same System 40% Done *Starting Quest 38% Done ( didnt work on allot ) *Custom Items Phats/Hweens/Santas/Whips 8% Done ( got stuck ) *Quests Same as in Emps-Scape ofcourse[/b][/i]
[i][b]Development Team[/b][/i]
[i][b]*Arman/Venticus I am still looking for 2 other Developers[/b][/i]
[i][b]If you wanna become Part of the Development Team and help us Make it Like Emps-Scape Please fill in the format bellow.
********************************************** Application Developer****************************** ********************************************** Age: Got skype? Y/N: Experience with Developing/Coding: Country/Tmz:
By Signing this Contract your Agreeing [I][COLOR="#FFA500"]To Dont Release the server when its done To dont Change anything in Game Without Permission to To dont Make anyone Staff without Permission to To Dont use Un-Wanted Language In-game/Skype
Please fill in your name here:
*********************************************** Application Developer****************************** ***********************************************[/b][/i]
For the peeps that doesnt know how emps scape looks like here are some vids.
Community
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=07dxspkdJcQ
This is how pking will look like ,
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5IELdM1wKUw
[i][b]Feel free to Register At our forums and keep Up-Date And help us Make the server faster online! Ofcourse you would get your Donator Rank Forums/In-Game We do not Take Risk of your Payments to us. As said Your Donator Rank will be given at the Forums and Game For helping us no other way to gain it. We keep our Promises,If any Rank Hasnt been given Please Post it At our Forums or Feel free to Pm any Developer.[/b][/i]
http://venticus.team.pro/ [i][b]( Our currently website ) Changing soon[/b][/i]
[color=orange][b]This is a project Thread - keep this on-topic[/b]

item.title: Emps-Scape Reborn Coming soon
item.dc:creator: @hatem hatem
item.description:
@hatem wrote:

[quote=“pr0 ownage, post:1, topic:527675”]

What I’ve Done

*Working Specials 100% Done
*Working Teleports 100% Done
*Working Ancients 100% Done
*Fixed Lunars 100% Done
*Regulars Magic has been fixed. 100% Done
*Fixed prayers 100% Done
*All hits are based on Your Gear 100% Done
*Ghost in wildy Teleports you to Daganoth kings 100% Done
*Started Pack has been Fixed 100% Done
*Ring of Stone has been Fixed 100% Done
*Attack Style has been Fixed 98% Done , Dh axe doesnt work yet
*Same Shops has been added 100% Done

Working on At the moment.

*Starting Tutorial 28% Done
*Same Npc Locations 80% Done
*Same Locations to Switch to Ancients/Lunars 10% Done
*Quest Tab Same System 40% Done
*Starting Quest 38% Done ( didnt work on allot )
*Custom Items Phats/Hweens/Santas/Whips 8% Done ( got stuck )
*Quests Same as in Emps-Scape ofcourse

Development Team

*Arman/Venticus
I am still looking for 2 other Developers

[i][b]If you wanna become Part of the Development Team and help us Make it Like
Emps-Scape Please fill in the format bellow.

Application Developer******************************

Age:
Got skype? Y/N:
Experience with Developing/Coding:
Country/Tmz:

By Signing this Contract your Agreeing
[I][COLOR="#FFA500"]To Dont Release the server when its done
To dont Change anything in Game Without Permission to
To dont Make anyone Staff without Permission to
To Dont use Un-Wanted Language In-game/Skype

Please fill in your name here:

Application Developer******************************
***********************************************[/b][/i]

For the peeps that doesnt know how emps scape looks like here are some vids.

We do not Take Risk of your Payments to us. As said Your Donator Rank will be given at the Forums and Game For helping us no other way to gain it. We keep our Promises,If any Rank Hasnt been given Please Post it At our Forums or Feel free to Pm any Developer.

http://venticus.team.pro/ ( Our currently website ) Changing soon

[color=orange]This is a project Thread - keep this on-topic[/quote]

item.title: Emps-Scape Reborn Coming soon
item.dc:creator: @cjuan2114 cjuan2114
item.description:
@cjuan2114 wrote:

[quote=“Naseem, post:4, topic:527675”]HOLD ON A SEC,

I would like to ask you one question since I’ve playedEemps-Scape for 5 years,

HOW DID YOU GOT THE SOURCE AND THE CLIENT??

Even thought Thomy didn’t want to release it in anyway, In case you have the real Emps-Scape source/client.

Edit:

What I've Done

*Working Specials  100% Done
*Working Teleports  100% Done
*Working Ancients  100% Done
*Fixed Lunars  100% Done
*Regulars Magic has been fixed.  100% Done
*Fixed prayers  100% Done
*All hits are based on Your Gear  100% Done
*Ghost in wildy Teleports you to Daganoth kings 100% Done
*Started Pack has been Fixed 100% Done
*Ring of Stone has been Fixed 100% Done
*Attack Style has been Fixed 98% Done , Dh axe doesnt work yet
*Same Shops has been added 100% Done

Emps-Scape already got them, If you have the real source/client

And yeah i would like to be part of your team if you have the real source/client
Age:19
Got skype? Y/N: Naseem1311
Experience with Developing/Coding: I’m good at coding?
Country/Tmz: pass.[/quote]

God … ofc he dosnt have the real emps scape server

Read full topic

item.title: Emps-Scape Reborn Coming soon
item.dc:creator: @marcbob marcbob
item.description:
@marcbob wrote:

You posted this in the wrong section. http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/board,149.0.html is for development teams. If you are looking to post a project thread of pure development, http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/board,125.0.html is the proper place.

EDIT: Mod moved to correct spot. Also, didn’t know they shut down so good luck I guess.
